name: Maximize
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Your next damaging or healing spell cast before the end of your next turn treats all dice rolled as if they had rolled their highest possible value.

If a spell deals or heals damage more than once, only the first roll is affected.
empower: Choose one: applies to all spells cast before the end of your next turn, or range becomes 30 feet and it affects the target creature instead of you.
